H0.text: who is the secretary of state for northern ireland. Julian Smith

H1.text: who is the secretary of state for northern ireland. Nigel Dodds

H2.text: who is the secretary of state for northern ireland. Owen Paterson

H3.text: who is the secretary of state for northern ireland. Karen Bradley

A4.text: The incumbent secretary of state for Northern Ireland is Hilary Benn.

A5.text: He served as Secretary of State for Northern Ireland from 2019 to 2020.

A6.text: Smith was made Secretary of State for Northern Ireland when Boris Johnson assumed the role of Prime Minister.

A7.text: Paterson served as Secretary of State for Northern Ireland from 2010 to 2012.

A8.text: During the formation of the Coalition Government in 2010, he was appointed to the Cabinet as Northern Ireland Secretary.
